LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Netflix, the world's dominant streaming service, will not make its TV shows and movies available through Apple's upcoming video offering, Netflix Chief Executive Reed Hastings said on Monday.

articles.title: The most shocking part of HBO's Theranos documentary, 'The Inventor,' according to director Alex Gibney
articles.description: HBO's "The Inventor" takes a look inside the rise and fall of the blood-testing startup Theranos. Director Alex Gibney talked to Business Insider about the things he was most shocked by while making the movie. Though Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney has sp…
articles.content: Though Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney has spent a lot of his career exploring stories that focus on the dishonest ("Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room") and the controversial ("Going Clear: Scientology & the Prison of Belief"), there are still thin… [+2552 chars]

articles.title: Elizabeth Warren says it's time for Mississippi to adopt a new state flag
articles.description: Democratic Sen. Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts said she believes it is time for Mississippi to disavow its Confederate icons — namely on its state flag. "I would support removing Confederate celebrations from federal lands and putting them in museums where…

articles.description: The disgraced founder of Theranos, Elizabeth Holmes, is not interviewed in the HBO documentary, "The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley" (which premiered Monday night). Director Alex Gibney told Business Insider about the process of trying to get her t…
articles.content: Though there's a lot of footage of Elizabeth Holmes in Alex Gibney's latest HBO documentary, "The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley," which looks at the rise and fall of Holmes' company Theranos, the director never interviewed her on camera. But it wa… [+2930 chars]
